file_content.text: Lord Thul! The base is under attack!
Send aid quickly. Border outpost two under attack. I repeat, under attack!
Perimeter defenses breached! We're under attack by assault droids. Repeat, a coordinated attack by probe and assault droids!
Blood of the queen!
There's an attack on one of your bases?
What's happening?
One we could handle.
The data feeds are showing all three of our border outposts under attack. A coordinated assault, Hunter-Killers and probe droids.
Sounds like you need a little Imperial support right now.
Just point me at the trouble.
Yes! Show those back biters that the Empire stands behind House Thul!
I'm no soldier, but I could probably defend your base.
You need help?
Yes! Go now. Hazard pay, whatever you want.
The data says all three border outposts are under attack. Looks like a coordinated effort, Hunter-Killers and probes.
I'm getting data feeds right now. It's a coordinated attack, all three border outposts. Hunter-Killers and probe droids.
All I've got out there is a skeleton crew. You're the only one close enough to reach them in time!
Please, save my bases! And bring me the memory cores from any probes you destroy. I want to know who's behind this. Good luck!
I'll bring you the heads of those droids. And their master.
I'll hunt them down.
Every second, more of your men's lives are lost.
No time to waste.
Thank you. Now hurry!
Impressive work! You can see we now have access to the Organa systems.
They're all talking about the, uh, ruthlessness and brutality of the recent attack. They, um, do train you Imperials well, don't they?
Wars are not won by talking.
Your hesitance is pathetic.
You're right. We're going to be trying for the throne. That's worth a little brutality.
On Korriban, we held little parties each time a fellow student died.
Very well, yes.
I... see. And, um, anyway....
Crush this rebellion now, and you will not have to fight them again.
This is a mercy.
True. When everyone has bowed to us, there will again be peace on Alderaan.
I'm no Imperial, but I'll take that as a compliment.
Just something I picked up.
I thought you might.
They fight with the fervor of patriots.
It was harder than I thought.
The Organas are trusted here. Many people have joined their resistance.
Moff Sarek told me to respect you, not to submit to schoolyard taunts.
Now that we can monitor the Organas' communications, it should be possible to--
Uh-oh.
This'll be easy.
Quit sniveling.
